siteMetadata.title: Paul Waweru
siteMetadata.subtitle: Software Engineer. I love to travel, eat and read (sometimes all at once). North London is Red. Navigating through this thing called life.

frontmatter.title: React Hooks (Continued)
frontmatter.description: As promised, today we take a look into useEffect, another hook used for managing side effects.

frontmatter.title: React Hooks
frontmatter.description: A recent update from the React team introduces Hooks, a neat way of handling state inside of functional components. Curious? Let's take a look!

frontmatter.title: GraphQL - Is this the end of RESTful API's?
frontmatter.description: In this post I embark on a journey through understanding and demystifying GraphQL, and I discuss whether this may be a good replacement for traditional RESTFul API's. Enjoy!
